alert.note: Alert for Griggs; Steele; Traill (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued April 20 at 3:21PM CDT until April 22 at 1:00AM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM CDT FRIDAY... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM FRIDAY TO 1 AM CDT SATURDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 9 inches. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Griggs, Steele and Traill Counties. * WHEN...For the Winter Storm Warning, until 4 AM CDT Friday. For the Winter Weather Advisory, from 4 AM Friday to 1 AM CDT Saturday. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...With ongoing flooding and water filled ditches, it is possible vehicles may slide off the road into very cold water. There remains a notable degree of uncertainty in snow amounts and associated impacts.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for North Dakota can be found at travel.dot.nd.gov and for Minnesota at 511mn.org, or by calling 5 1 1 in either state.
